Description: Search & download a suitable dataset (e.g., sales, e-commerce)
Fill or remove missing values in dataset columns
Identify and drop duplicate rows
Convert columns to correct types (numbers, dates, strings)
Export cleaned dataset as CSV for next steps
Compute mean, median, min, max, counts per column
Visualize trends with line, bar, pie charts
Determine key metrics for dashboard (sales, revenue, users)
Reshape dataset for visualization, create pivot tables
Summarize key findings for README and presentation
Decide prediction goal (sales, churn, or classification)
Select relevant features, split dataset into train/test
Build regression/classification model using PyTorch
Check model performance metrics
Save predictions to CSV for dashboard integration
Record methodology, parameters, and results
Create project skeleton, setup Visual Studio solution
Load CSV into backend and test read operations
Embed Power BI charts into MVC app
Show model predictions dynamically on dashboard
Host app on AWS EC2 or S3
Verify all features, visuals, and AI outputs work
Update README with day-by-day progress, screenshots
Capture all Epics/Tasks for proof
Export images/screenshots of charts
Export model predictions and charts
Summarize project, include repo link + screenshots
